src:
'Skuat Muda Chelsea Sangat Kuat, Talentanya Berlimpah'
05 Nov 2019, 01:11 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Pemain asal Amerika Serikat, Christian Pulisic, sadar bahwa Chelsea yang merupakan klubnya saat ini berisikan banyak pemain hebat nan bertalenta. Ia bahkan sampai yakin bahwa the Blues bisa bersaing dengan tim-tim besar lainnya di musim ini.
Kualitas dalam playmaking merupakan satu hal yang membuat Pulisic bisa mendarat di Stamford Bridge musim panas kemarin. Seperti yang diketahui, ia diboyong dari Borussia Dortmund pada bulan Januari lalu dengan bandrol mencapai 58 juta pounds.
Harapannya, Pulisic bisa menambahkan kualitas kreativitas di lini depan Chelsea. Terutama setelah mereka ditinggal Eden Hazard yang memilih hengkang ke Real Madrid.
Pria berumur 21 tahun itu sempat mengalami masa-masa sulit yang membuat performanya disoroti banyak kalangan. Namun belakangan ini, ia mulai menunjukkan sinarnya seperti waktu masih memperkuat Dortmund dulu.

Scroll ke bawah untuk membaca informasi selengkapnya.
text:
'Chelsea Youth Squad Very Strong, Abundant Talent'
05 November 2019, 01:11 by Bola.net
Bola.net - American player Christian Pulisic is aware that Chelsea, which is his club at the moment, contains many talented and talented players. He even came to believe that the Blues can compete with other big teams this season.
The quality of playmaking is one thing that allowed Pulisic to land at Stamford Bridge last summer. As you know, he was brought in from Borussia Dortmund in January with a bandrol of 58 million pounds.
The hope, Pulisic can add to the quality of creativity on the front lines of Chelsea. Especially after they left Eden Hazard who chose to leave to Real Madrid.
The 21-year-old man had experienced hard times that made his performance highlighted by many circles. But lately, he began to show his light like when he was still strengthening Dortmund first.

Scroll down to read full information.
